price: The mosques[9] are for Allah alone, so do not supplicate anyone along with Allah.
arabic: وَأَنَّ ٱلۡمَسَٰجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدۡعُواْ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٗا
footnotes: [9] "Masjid" here means every place of worship on earth.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
